SCRIPT.MSCRI: if [ "$UC4RB_SSH_OSNAME" -eq "WINDOWS" ] then : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.JBOSS_RESTART_APP_PREPARE_WIN_CMD : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = "&UC4RB_CMD_WIN#" : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = "&AGENT_TEMPDIR#/tempdir-&$RUNID#/cmd2-&$RUNID#.ps1" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_FILE : SET &UC4RB_SRC_FILE_PATH#="&AGENT_TEMPDIR#/tempdir-&$RUNID#" : PRINT "Command Executed: &UC4RB_CMD_WIN#" sed -i "s/\$UC4_DECRYPTED_JB_PWD/$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD/" &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = 'powershell tempdir-&$RUNID#\cmd2-&$RUNID#.ps1' : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = "&AGENT_TEMPDIR#/cmd4-&$RUNID#.txt" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_FILE : SET &UC4RB_OUTPUTMODE# = "0" : SET &UC4RB_CMD_FILE_PATH# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_RUN_SCRIPT else : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.JBOSS_RESTART_APP_PREPARE_UNIX_CMD : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = "&UC4RB_CMD_UNX#" : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = "&AGENT_TEMPDIR#/tempdir-&$RUNID#/cmd3-&$RUNID#.sh" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_FILE : SET &UC4RB_SRC_FILE_PATH#="&AGENT_TEMPDIR#/tempdir-&$RUNID#" : PRINT "Command Executed: &UC4RB_CMD_UNX#" sed -i "s/\$UC4_DECRYPTED_JB_PWD/$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD/" &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT#="sed -i 's/\r$//' tempdir-&$RUNID#/cmd3-&$RUNID#.sh ; sh tempdir-&$RUNID#/cmd3-&$RUNID#.sh" : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = "&AGENT_TEMPDIR#/cmd5-&$RUNID#.txt" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_FILE : SET &UC4RB_OUTPUTMODE# = "0" : SET &UC4RB_CMD_FILE_PATH# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_RUN_SCRIPT fi
